Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

ControllerCapabilities.longDescription: This type shall describe the capabilities of a controller.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DataCenterBridging.description: Data center bridging (DCB) for this controller.
DataCenterBridging.longDescription: This property shall contain capability, status, and configuration values related to data center bridging (DCB) for this controller.

NPAR.description: NIC Partitioning (NPAR) capabilities for this controller.
NPAR.longDescription: This property shall contain capability, status, and configuration values related to NIC partitioning for this controller.

NPIV.description: N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) capabilities for this controller.
NPIV.longDescription: This property shall contain N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) capabilities for this controller.

NetworkDeviceFunctionCount.description: The maximum number of physical functions available on this controller.
NetworkDeviceFunctionCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of physical functions available on this controller.

NetworkPortCount.description: The number of physical ports on this controller.
NetworkPortCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of physical ports on this controller.

VirtualizationOffload.longDescription: This property shall contain capability, status, and configuration values related to virtualization offload for this controller.

ControllerLinks.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
ControllerLinks.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ActiveSoftwareImage.description: The link to the software inventory resource that represents the active firmware image for this controller.
ActiveSoftwareImage.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type `SoftwareInventory` that represents the active firmware image for this controller.

NetworkDeviceFunctions.description: An array of links to the network device functions associated with this network controller.
NetworkDeviceFunctions.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type `NetworkDeviceFunction` that represent the network device functions associated with this network controller.

NetworkPorts.deprecated: This property has been deprecated in favor of the `Ports` property.
NetworkPorts.description: An array of links to the network ports associated with this network controller.
NetworkPorts.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type `NetworkPort` that represent the network ports associated with this network controller.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PCIeDevices.description: An array of links to the PCIe devices associated with this network controller.
PCIeDevices.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type `PCIeDevice` that represent the PCIe devices associated with this network controller.

Ports.description: An array of links to the ports associated with this network controller.
Ports.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type `Port` that represent the ports associated with this network controller.

SoftwareImages.description: The images that are associated with this controller.
SoftwareImages.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resource of type `SoftwareInventory` that represent the firmware images that apply to this controller.

Controllers.description: A network controller ASIC that makes up part of a network adapter.
Controllers.longDescription: This type shall describe a network controller ASIC that makes up part of a network adapter.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ControllerCapabilities.longDescription: This property shall contain the capabilities of this controller.

FirmwarePackageVersion.description: The version of the user-facing firmware package.
FirmwarePackageVersion.longDescription: This property shall contain the version number of the user-facing firmware package.

Identifiers.description: The durable names for the network adapter controller.
Identifiers.longDescription: This property shall contain a list of all known durable names for the controller associated with the network adapter.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

Location.description: The location of the network adapter controller.
Location.longDescription: This property shall contain the location information of the controller associated with the network adapter.

PCIeInterface.description: The PCIe interface details for this controller.
PCIeInterface.longDescription: This property shall contain details for the PCIe interface that connects this PCIe-based controller to its host.

DataCenterBridging.description: Data center bridging (DCB) for capabilities of a controller.
DataCenterBridging.longDescription: This type shall describe the capability, status, and configuration values related to data center bridging (DCB) for a controller.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Capable.description: An indication of whether this controller is capable of data center bridging (DCB).
Capable.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether this controller is capable of data center bridging (DCB).

NPIV.description: N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) capabilities for a controller.
NPIV.longDescription: This type shall contain N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) capabilities for a controller.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MaxDeviceLogins.description: The maximum number of N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) logins allowed simultaneously from all ports on this controller.
MaxDeviceLogins.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum number of N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) logins allowed simultaneously from all ports on this controller.

MaxPortLogins.description: The maximum number of N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) logins allowed per physical port on this controller.
MaxPortLogins.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum number of N_Port ID Virtualization (NPIV) logins allowed per physical port on this controller.

NetworkAdapter.description: The `NetworkAdapter` schema represents a physical network adapter capable of connecting to a computer network.  Examples include but are not limited to Ethernet, Fibre Channel, and converged network adapters.
NetworkAdapter.longDescription: This resource shall represent a physical network adapter capable of connecting to a computer network in a Redfish implementation.  Services should represent adapters that contain multiple controllers with independent management interfaces as multiple `NetworkAdapter` resources.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Assembly.description: The link to the assembly resource associated with this adapter.
Assembly.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type `Assembly`.

Certificates.description: The link to a collection of certificates for device identity and attestation.
Certificates.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type `CertificateCollection` that contains certificates for device identity and attestation.

Controllers.description: The set of network controllers ASICs that make up this NetworkAdapter.
Controllers.longDescription: This property shall contain the set of network controllers ASICs that make up this network adapter.

EnvironmentMetrics.description: The link to the environment metrics for this network adapter.
EnvironmentMetrics.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type `EnvironmentMetrics` that specifies the environment metrics for this network adapter.

Identifiers.description: The durable names for the network adapter.
Identifiers.longDescription: This property shall contain a list of all known durable names for the network adapter.

LLDPEnabled.description: Enable or disable LLDP globally for an adapter.
LLDPEnabled.longDescription: This property shall contain the state indicating whether LLDP is globally enabled on a network adapter.  If set to `false`, the `LLDPEnabled` value for the ports associated with this adapter shall be disregarded.

Location.description: The location of the network adapter.
Location.longDescription: This property shall contain the location information of the network adapter.

Manufacturer.description: The manufacturer or OEM of this network adapter.
Manufacturer.longDescription: This property shall contain a value that represents the manufacturer of the network adapter.

Measurements.deprecated: This property has been deprecated in favor of the `ComponentIntegrity` resource.
Measurements.description: An array of DSP0274-defined measurement blocks.
Measurements.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of DSP0274-defined measurement blocks.

Metrics.description: The link to the metrics associated with this adapter.
Metrics.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type `NetworkAdapterMetrics` that contains the metrics associated with this adapter.

Model.description: The model string for this network adapter.
Model.longDescription: This property shall contain the information about how the manufacturer refers to this network adapter.

NetworkDeviceFunctions.description: The link to the collection of network device functions associated with this network adapter.
NetworkDeviceFunctions.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type `NetworkDeviceFunctionCollection`.

NetworkPorts.deprecated: This property has been deprecated in favor of the `Ports` property.
NetworkPorts.description: The link to the collection of network ports associated with this network adapter.
NetworkPorts.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type `NetworkPortCollection`.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PartNumber.description: Part number for this network adapter.
PartNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain the part number for the network adapter as defined by the manufacturer.

Ports.description: The link to the collection of ports associated with this network adapter.
Ports.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type `PortCollection`.

Processors.description: The link to the collection of offload processors contained in this network adapter.
Processors.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type `ProcessorCollection` that represent the offload processors contained in this network adapter.

SKU.description: The manufacturer SKU for this network adapter.
SKU.longDescription: This property shall contain the SKU for the network adapter.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number for this network adapter.
SerialNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain the serial number for the network adapter.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

NicPartitioning.description: NIC Partitioning capability, status, and configuration for a controller.
NicPartitioning.longDescription: This type shall contain the capability, status, and configuration values for a controller.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

NparCapable.description: An indication of whether the controller supports NIC function partitioning.
NparCapable.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the controller supports NIC function partitioning.

NparEnabled.description: An indication of whether NIC function partitioning is active on this controller.
NparEnabled.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether NIC function partitioning is active on this controller.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Reset.description: This action resets the network adapter.
Reset.longDescription: This action shall reset a network adapter.

ResetType.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the type of reset.  The service can accept a request without the parameter and shall perform a `GracefulRestart`.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ResetSettingsToDefault.description: This action is to clear the settings back to factory defaults.
ResetSettingsToDefault.longDescription: This action shall reset of all active and pending settings back to factory default settings upon reset of the network adapter.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SRIOV.longDescription: This type shall contain single-root input/output virtualization (SR-IOV) capabilities.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SRIOVEnabled.description: An indication of whether single root input/output virtualization (SR-IOV) is enabled for this controller.
SRIOVEnabled.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether single root input/output virtualization (SR-IOV) is enabled for this controller.

SRIOVVEPACapable.description: An indication of whether this controller supports single root input/output virtualization (SR-IOV) in Virtual Ethernet Port Aggregator (VEPA) mode.
SRIOVVEPACapable.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether this controller supports single root input/output virtualization (SR-IOV) in Virtual Ethernet Port Aggregator (VEPA) mode.

VirtualFunction.description: A virtual function of a controller.
VirtualFunction.longDescription: This type shall describe the capability, status, and configuration values related to a virtual function for a controller.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DeviceMaxCount.description: The maximum number of virtual functions supported by this controller.
DeviceMaxCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum number of virtual functions supported by this controller.

MinAssignmentGroupSize.description: The minimum number of virtual functions that can be allocated or moved between physical functions for this controller.
MinAssignmentGroupSize.longDescription: This property shall contain the minimum number of virtual functions that can be allocated or moved between physical functions for this controller.

NetworkPortMaxCount.description: The maximum number of virtual functions supported per network port for this controller.
NetworkPortMaxCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum number of virtual functions supported per network port for this controller.

VirtualizationOffload.description: A Virtualization offload capability of a controller.
VirtualizationOffload.longDescription: This type shall describe the capability, status, and configuration values related to a virtualization offload for a controller.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SRIOV.longDescription: This property shall contain single-root input/output virtualization (SR-IOV) capabilities.

VirtualFunction.description: The virtual function of the controller.
VirtualFunction.longDescription: This property shall describe the capability, status, and configuration values related to the virtual function for this controller.

title: #NetworkAdapter.v1_12_1.NetworkAdapter
